t:
I know now why you cry, but it’s something I can never do.

For you are full of life and grace, and I am rough and blue.

You loved me once, you loved me deep, you made me feel a thrill.

But you also loved the crowd, you loved the sound, you made me feel a chill.
c:
You left me here, you left me out, you left me in the shade.
But you also left me space, you left me peace, you left me with a blade
To carve myself, to hone my skills, to cut through the gloom.
But I can never join you, I can never follow you, I can never be in bloom.

I know now why you cry, but it’s something I can never do.
For we are not alike, we are apart, but I will always love you.



The first line is from Terminator 2: Judgment Day.

Background generated with Dall-E.


#love #loss #sad #loneliness #identity #contrast #unrequitedlove #selfdiscovery
